ghost

Class Whim

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Entity
      • ghost.Ghost
        • ghost.Whim

  • public class Whim
extends Ghost
    A specific type of ghost that uses the chaser and waka's position to calculate its target.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(App app)
        The tick method is run once every frame, it calculates the target location depending on the ghost's mode, then chooses a direction to move in and moves forwards. In the whim's case, this is double the vector from Chaser to 2 grid spaces ahead of Waka in chase mode, and the top left corner in scatter mode. In frightened mode, the target location is randomised.
        Specified by:
        tick in class Ghost

      • calculateTarget

        public int[] calculateTarget(App app)
        Calculates the target location of the Whim based on the waka and chaser. This target is double the vector from Chaser to 2 grid spaces ahead of Waka.
        Parameters:
        app -
        Returns:
        int[] coordinates
